results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ጌታው በተቀደሰው ሸለቆ በጡዋ በጠራው ጊዜ፤
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ወደ ፈርዖን ኺድ፡፡ እርሱ ወሰን አልፏልና፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: «ወደ ጌታህም ልመራህ ትፈራውም ዘንድ፤ (መንገድ አለህን?)» አለው፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
